title: Effects of recruiting trainees from Petra Christian University to the brand image of golden river restaurant
abstract: This thesis is written by the writers as the requirement to finish the writers? study in Hotel Management of Petra Christian University, Indonesia and in CHN (Christelijke Hogeschool Noord - Nederland). As a whole, this thesis will analyze the effects of recruiting trainees from Indonesia to the brand image of a restaurant in the Netherlands. And in the same time it will also examine the guests? dining experience with the trainees? presence. Therefore the writers choose Golden River Restaurant where the writers work for one year traineeship. This thesis is divided into six chapters in which every chapter will have its content.
source: Skripsi No. 02010152/HTL/2004; Jerry Kartyasa (33499121), Guntoro Rusli (33499122)
